definition: small freshwater turtle having a strong musky odor
details:
noun
- small freshwater turtle having a strong musky odor
= synonyms: musk turtle
- a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible
= synonyms: bum, rat, skunk, stinker, crumb, rotter, dirty dog, puke, lowlife, scum bag, so-and-so, git
